thread.title: BREAKING: London Terrorist Identified as Khalid Masood
thread.title_full: BREAKING: London Terrorist Identified as Khalid Masood

author: Jon Levine
title: BREAKING: London Terrorist Identified as Khalid Masood
text:
BREAKING: London Terrorist Identified as Khalid Masood by Jon Levine | 11:40 am, March 23rd, 2017 
The terrorist who killed four and injured 20 in an attack in London, Wednesday has been identified as 52-year-old Khalid Masood, British media reported . 
Masood was identified by Scotland Yard which added that he had long been known to British authorities due to prior convictions for assault, possession of offensive weapons, and public disorder, BBC reported . 
Masood was shot dead by British police not far from Parliament. In a subsequent announcement, ISIS claimed responsibility for the attack. 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
